title: Game crashed,now I can't reconnect or anything else
body:
So I wanted to get my win of the day and played an aram.
Everything went fine until my game suddenly crashed for no reason,so I tried to reconnect,but wasn't able to.

I then relogged into the game(because sometimes this actually helps),but now I always end up in the client telling me to reconnect to the game,which i try,but which never works.

However I am pretty sure the game has ended already,because it would be going for roughly 2 hours by now(we were already at their inhibitor when the game crashed),so I am kinda unsure if the game is still going on or not,yet I always get the message to try to reconnect,which simply always fails....


EDIT:
So after roughly 2-3 hours and restarting my pc I was finally able to get back into the client and play normally.

However the game doesn't even show up in my match history.

replies.body:
Hey GreenLore!

I read through the issue your having and wanted to chime in with some information.  It appears that individual Game Server that you were playing your game on experienced some issues, causing your game to crash and made it unable to reconnect to.  If this particular Game Server crashed, and no one reconnected back to the game, then the games on this server simply disappeared.  No rewards/penalties will be given, and it will be as if it was never played. 

When we see issues like this with individual Game Servers, we investigate in-depth to determine what happened and take steps to prevent this in the future.  Hopefully you haven't experienced anything like this since!

Hey! I know this is sorta late for this forum, but the problem is back and its preventing some friends and I from joining the game at all.
Good thing is that i dont get penalties for this disconnect, but i still feel bad about leaving people to 4v5s!! :c its not fair for me nor them.

EDIT: Nevermind, I just got leaverbuster for no reason because of this glitch :c...

Ah thanks for clarification.
I was a bit surprised that the client told me the game crashed and not simply that i lost connection.

And no I didn't experience it again since then(in one game,my game suddenly froze though,but i was able to reconnect).

I hope you find the source of this issue ;)
